metrics.name: China Credit Proxy (CBON)

ai_insights.crash_analysis:
• Convergence Status: LOW CONVERGENCE (0.0 score) — No simultaneous stress signals in yields, USD/JPY, USD/CNH, or China credit proxies.
  • 1. SIMULTANEOUS MOVEMENT: Only USD/JPY (156.13) shows CRITICAL SHOCK. US yields (4.02%), USD/CNH (7.0680), and China credit (CBON: $22.58) remain stable.
  • 2. 10Y Auction Bid-to-Cover: Normal demand (2.43x) — No funding shock (stress threshold: <2.3x).
  • 3. China Credit Stress: No LGFV distress — VanEck China Bond ETF trades normally.
